text:
e="preserve">Vehbi Akdağ (1 January 1949 – 23 June 2020) was a Turkish wrestler. He was an Olympic silver medalist in Freestyle wrestling. Akdağ competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich where he won a silver medal in featherweight class in Freestyle wrestling He was born in Tokat, Turkey.
Akdağ died on 23 June 2020 in Tokat, aged 71.
